item.title: Senate stalls on shutdown vote amid warning furloughed workers may lose pay
item.description: White House memo suggests 750,000 furloughed federal workers may not get back pay despite 2019 law, sparking bipartisan concern among lawmakers.

item.title: Winsome Earle-Sears releases ‘Two Bullets’ ad scathing opponent for failing to demand Jay Jones’ ouster
item.description: Winsome Earle-Sears criticizes Abigail Spanberger in new political ad for supporting Democratic attorney general nominee Jay Jones amid controversy.
